verses.roman:
āpana kāruṇya, loke vairāgya-śikṣaṇa
sva-bhaktera gāḍha-anurāga-prakaṭī-karaṇa

synonyms: āpana—personal; kāruṇya—favor; loke—to the people in general; vairāgya-śikṣaṇa—teaching about the order of renunciation; sva-bhaktera—of His devotees; gāḍha—deep; anurāga—of attachment; prakaṭī—manifestation; karaṇa—causing.
translation: This incident manifests the mercy of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, His teaching that a sannyāsī should remain in the renounced order, and the deep attachment to Him felt by His faithful devotees.
